name: WPSyncSheets Lite For Contact Form 7 – Contact Form 7 Google Spreadsheet Addon
author: Creative Werk Designs

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Google Spreadsheet Addon – WPSyncSheets For Contact Form 7 plugin sync with your Contact Form 7 entries to single Google Spreadsheet. The plugin has the leading popularity amongst the plugin to save users Contact Form 7 forms entries within one single Google Spreadsheet. It can easily save all your entries in single spreadsheets with great features.

Live Demo | Documentation | Need Support? | Upgrade Pro

What’s Included for Free:

Contact Form 7 Google Spreadsheet Addon – WPSyncSheets For Contact Form 7, where users can easily save all the entries within one google spreadsheet to make your enquiries/data effective, so google spreadsheet can save your entries of users Contact Form 7 forms. Once a user will select the created new spreadsheet with settings option, it will automatically create a new google spreadsheet and sheets based on the name in the settings page.

Enable/Disable Settings – This setting will help the user to enable/disable the Contact Forms WPSyncSheets settings. Some of the forms do not require Google Spreadsheets settings.

Save Entries – We can easily save all the entries with one Google Spreadsheet to make your enquiries/data effectively. Google Spreadsheet can save your entries of your contact forms 7.

New Speadsheets & Sheets – Once the user will select the create new Spreadsheet with settings option, it will auto create the new spreadsheet and sheets based on the name in the settings page

Duplicate Forms – Users can create multiple duplicate forms that can be assigned to the entries based on the forms settings. Different forms can send data to different sheets based on form settings.

Freeze Sheet Headers – User can easily freeze the header row (first row) of the sheet with the setting page option. It can be easily enabled/disable whenever we need it.

View/Clear/Download Spreadsheet – Get all options in one place. View, Clear and Download your Google Spreadsheet with a single click from the plugin’s Settings page.

Submission Date & Time Option – By enabling the Submission Date option, you can track the date and time your form was submitted. The feature will display the date and time of each form submission in a new column.

WPSyncSheets For Contact Form 7 Pro Features

[Pro] Edit Sheet Headers – User can easily edit sheet headers name within the settings page. There are simple text fields to change the name of the sheet headers. It will be auto affected with google spreadsheet headers.

[Pro] PayPal or Stripe Payment Status – Users can easily enable/disable adding new form entries whenever PayPal or Stripe payments have completed payment status.

[Pro] Sorting Sheet Headers – By Default order will be the same as fields have been added in contact form. We can change the sheet headers name as per our requirements orders.

[Pro] Save Files – If your forms will have file field then it will automatically save those files within our plugin folder and add a link to Google Spreadsheet. We can easily check attachment by single click with Google Spreadsheet entries.

How to Save Contact Form 7 Data Submissions to Google Spreadsheet? [Free]

WPSyncsheets For Contact Form 7 works as a bridge between Contact Form 7 and Google Spreadsheets. It helps you to send, save and manage all your form submissions in a Google Spreadsheet without touching a single line of code.

WPSyncsheets For Contact Form 7 helps you connect Contact Form 7 to Google Sheets without using any 3rd external party application. The plugin comes with easy-to-use and flexible features that automatically save and send your form entries to Google Spreadsheets with just a few clicks.

How to Connect Contact Form 7 with Google Sheets: Step-by-step tutorial

Whats’ Next

Other useful plugins from WPSyncSheets for sync with Google Spreadsheet.

WPSyncSheets For Formidable Forms: Formidable Forms Google Spreadsheet Addon
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire contactsheets-lite folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find WPSyncSheets For Contact Form 7 menu in your WordPress admin screen.

For basic usage, have a look at the plugin’s Documentation.
sections.faq:
Why form data isn’t sent to Google Spreadshet or just spinning?

Sometimes it will take some time to add data into the google spreadsheet but if data never show up then, there are following ways to resolved this error:

  1. Revoke token at WPSyncSheets Lite For Contact Form 7 Settings Page.
  2. Check the Google Sheets & Google Drive API must be Enable.

Can I reorder/add/edit the sheets header columns in Google Spreadsheets?

These features are include in Pro Version

sections.reviews:
Great

By keshaymode on November 29, 2022

Great plugin with great support!

Worst Plugin ever..!!!!

By swatimodi on December 14, 2020

There are many issues in this plugin.. I can not connect my existing spreadsheet and if I want to connect, this plugin can't allow to select my existing spreadsheet... and many debug statement on error log (undefined), plus other addons settings overwrites. not compatible with other addons.

Excellent and Super useful to connect my Contact Form 7 to google sheets! :)

By demeterla on September 9, 2020

Thanks a lot! I was looking for a solution without zapier to connect contact form 7 to google sheets. This is working like a charm! Thumbs up! Thanks!

Great Plugin - Very useful

By SEO Builder (seobuilder) on September 9, 2020

I found this plugin, and it did exactly what I needed it to do. Works very well, simple to install and does exactly whats it says it does. I would highly recommend this plugin.

short_description: Send your Contact Form 7 data to your Google Sheets spreadsheet.
